title: How the Angel Banished from Heaven Becomes an Adventurer - Novel Updates
author: Aomizu Ryu   青水龍
description:
One day, Roel, a lazy and useless angel who had been spending his days lazily without working, was summoned by Zephyrus, the absolute god who rules heaven, and after being lectured, he was told that he would be expelled from heaven. Roel pretended to be sorry and apologized, but he was not forgiven.
Afterwards, Roel is thrown down from Heaven to Earth, where he accidentally saves Claire, a new adventurer who is about to be attacked by thugs. After witnessing Roel's abilities, Claire invites him to 'become an adventurer and earn money with me!' Claire invites him to join her. Although he tried to refuse, he couldn't, and Roel became an adventurer and started to live on Earth......>
